global.schema:
type AtlasActiveDataState {
  name: String
  docNo: String
  parent: PHID! 
  content: String
  masterStatus: Status! # 
  globalTags: [GlobalTag!]!
  references: [PHID!]!
  provenance: URL
  notionId: String # verify if this can be changed to UUID type
}

enum Status {
  PLACEHOLDER
  PROVISIONAL # enables ecosystem participants to interact with the material in a practical context, resulting in valuable feedback or other data concerning the Document's appropriateness.
  APPROVED # material instance can be integrated into the Atlas
  DEFERRED
  ARCHIVED
  
}

enum GlobalTag {
    SCOPE_ADVISOR_,
    AVC_,
    CAIS_,
    ML___LOW_PRIORITY_,
    EXTERNAL_REFERENCE_,
    DAO_TOOLKIT_,
    ML___DEFER_,
    PURPOSE_SYSTEM_,
    NEWCHAIN_,
    ML___SUPPORT_DOCS_NEEDED_,
    TWO_STAGE_BRIDGE_,
    ECOSYSTEM_INTELLIGENCE_,
    RECURSIVE_IMPROVEMENT_,
    LEGACY_TERM___USE_APPROVED_,
}

operations.name: UPDATE_ACTIVE_DATA
operations.schema:
input UpdateActiveDataInput {
  name: String
  content: String
  masterStatus: [Status!]!
  globalTags: [String]
  references: [PHID!]!
}
